job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pDorsal Health is reshaping healthcare to free 50 million Americans from chronic pain and musculoskeletal conditions such as spine pain arthritis workplace injuries and opioid addiction Our endtoend clinical care model combines technology with a human touch to provide members with ondemand access to elite specialists empathetic care teams and personalized treatment programs Were backed by top Silicon Valley venture capitalists and founders of the fastestgrowing digital health startupsppbrppstrongAbout the rolestrongppAs an early member of our engineering team youll partner closely with a worldclass group of doctors designers operators and founders to build products that deliver radically better clinical outcomes at significantly lower costs Youll use your experience and expertise to raise the bar on code quality and take a lead role in setting technical direction Youre autonomous and selfdriven but can work effectively in a highly collaborative setting In your first few months you may find yourself working onpulliIntuitive and engaging virtual care experiences such as video visits 247 live messaging provider matching and appointment schedulingliliIntelligent tooling and electronic health record systems to improve the efficacy of our inhouse clinical staffliliConnected wearable devices that monitor and reduce workplace injury riskliulpbrppstrongWhat youll dostrongpulliCollaborate with designers clinicians and other engineers to build new features from start to finish through conception research implementation and maintenanceliliDrive fullstack product development for care delivery platforms used by both internal providers and external consumersliliHelp set up and iterate on foundational engineering processes including version control continuous integration deployment infrastructure and internal documentationliliUphold standards for quality by performing code reviews fixing bugs creating automated tests and monitoring performanceliliGrow the team by onboarding and helping to recruit highly capable engineersliulpbrppstrongWhat you havestrongpulli2 years of professional experience developing software for production environmentsliliStrong written and verbal communication skills with the ability to convey complicated systems to both technical and nontechnical audiencesliliExperience working across the stack on frontend backend and infrastructure you dont need to be an expert in all of these but it helps to be interested in learning about themliliProficiency with tools and frameworks for modern web  mobile application development Our current favorites are TypeScript React React Native Nextjs Apollo GraphQL Hasura PostgreSQL and TerraformliliExcellent problem solving and debugging skills with the right balance between development velocity and designing for longterm scalabilityliliBachelors degree in Computer Science Computer Engineering or a similar technical fieldliulpbrppstrongBonus points if you havestrongpulliExperience designing deploying and managing cloud infrastructureliliA passion for solving meaningful problems in healthcare through technologyliliPast entrepreneurial proof points such as earlystage startup experience building new products or teams at larger companies exploring ideas or side projects etcliulpbrppstrongWhat youll gainstrongpulliHighly competitive salary and equity in a fastgrowing startupliliComprehensive healthcare dental vision and 401k plansliliGenerous PTO policy and 10 paid national holidaysliliRemotefriendly culture with local inperson office hubs and coworkingliliExciting career growth opportunities including mentorship from leading technical advisors and entrepreneursliulpbrppDorsal Health is proud to be an Equal Employment Employer We dont discriminate based upon race religion color national origin gender including pregnancy childbirth or related medical conditions sexual orientation gender identity gender expression age status as a protected veteran status as an individual with a disability or other applicable legally protected characteristicsp
